title: Captain Celluloid vs. the Film Pirates

sources.title: Captain Celluloid vs. the Film Pirates (1966) Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Silent film
sources.description:
Captain Celluloid battles the evil Master Duper and his criminal gang, the League of Film Pirates, who plan to hijack copies of classic films, copy them and sell them to desperate film collectors all over the world.  A silent film easily watched in 2x speed!

Director: Louis McMahon
Writers: William K. Everson, Louis McMahon 
Stars: Robert Miller, Doris Burnell, Alan G. Barbour 
Genre:  Classics, Cult Film, Action & Adventure, Comedy, Science Fiction & Fantasy

Find the rest of the cult on social media :
https://www.facebook.com/CultCinemaClassics
